message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your proposal, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is undeniable. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,080,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1,060,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
